ViewObject.Name: xxHzPuiContactPointEmailTableVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.CONTACT_POINT_ID, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.CONTACT_POINT_TYPE, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.STATUS, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.OWNER_TABLE_NAME, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.OWNER_TABLE_ID, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.PRIMARY_FLAG, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.EMAIL_FORMAT, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.EMAIL_ADDRESS, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.CONTACT_POINT_PURPOSE, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.PRIMARY_BY_PURPOSE, AL.MEANING || decode(HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.PRIMARY_BY_PURPOSE, 'Y', '( Primary )') USAGE, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.CREATION_DATE, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.ATTRIBUTE1, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.ATTRIBUTE2, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.ATTRIBUTE3, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.ATTRIBUTE4, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.ATTRIBUTE5, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.ATTRIBUTE6, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.ATTRIBUTE7, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.ATTRIBUTE8, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.ATTRIBUTE9, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.ATTRIBUTE10, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.ATTRIBUTE11, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.ATTRIBUTE12, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.ATTRIBUTE13, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.ATTRIBUTE14, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.ATTRIBUTE15, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.ATTRIBUTE16, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.ATTRIBUTE17, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.ATTRIBUTE18, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.ATTRIBUTE19, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.ATTRIBUTE20, HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.ACTUAL_CONTENT_SOURCE FROM HZ_CONTACT_POINTS HzPuiContactPointEmailEO, fnd_lookup_values al WHERE HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.CONTACT_POINT_TYPE ='EMAIL' and HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.STATUS = 'A' and al.view_application_id(+) = 222 and al.language(+) = userenv('LANG') and al.lookup_type(+) = 'CONTACT_POINT_PURPOSE' and HzPuiContactPointEmailEO.CONTACT_POINT_PURPOSE = al.LOOKUP_CODE(+)
